name: Pumpkin Crunch Coffee Cake
author: Brittany Owens
summary: We have compiled a list of our favorite pumpkin recipes. This one is sure to please! It's a twist on a traditional coffee cake.
ingredients: ¼ cup milk, or as needed
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Stir brown sugar, pecans, butter, flour, cinnamon, cloves, and nutmeg together in a bowl to make crunch mixture
Mix yellow cake mix, pumpkin, eggs, and water together in a separate bowl until batter is smooth
Pour half of the batter into the prepared baking dish; top with crunch mixture
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 30 to 35 minutes
Whisk confectioners' sugar and milk together in a small bowl, adding more milk if needed to reach a pourable consistency; drizzle over the cake
